revised_title: Precise Measurement and Application of the Mercury Vapour Pumping Effect in McLeod Gauge Metrology
tldr: The authors conducted extensive measurements to determine the mercury vapour pumping effect on various gases in McLeod gauge metrology. They developed a semi-empirical equation to calculate the mercury pumping pressures for any given set of conditions and tested it against their measurements. This work reestablishes the accuracy and reliability of the McLeod-gauge-cold-trap system for measuring low gas pressures.
